Name: STARWAY VR
About the game: ［Update 2019.04.18] Hey, captain! Now you can Remote control your spaceship and shooting space monsters! 1. Enhance the shooting system; 2. Add tutorial of the shooting system; 3. Adjust monster behavior; ［Update 2019.03.23] 1. New UNKNOWN SPACE LIFE! Attention Caption, UNKNOW SPACE LIFE was in found 1-4、1-5 With territorial, will attack player's ship while closing Of course, you could use the weapon to fight with them 2. Now your ship has HP! While HP=0, your ship will explode, To recover HP, recombine your ship. 3.NEW! Manual AIMING MODE! When the small monitor opened, you could switch to Manual mode by the Up Button on the Right Hand, Otherwise, it will be in Auto aiming mode. In the Manual Aiming Mode, there will be a line point out from your right-hand controller, use it to aim your target. 4.NEW! Target Lock On Hints! Finding out a target in Auto Aiming Mode, or, aiming target in Manual Aiming Mode, A Locked On hint will appear at the target, the HP will be shown if the target is an UNKNOWN SPACE LIFE. 5. Information description added to the Parts Panel Power and Weight information will be shown now， other information will be added later, such as Function description. 6. Take out parts from Parts Panel The parts will be bigger and bigger until it becomes the original size 7. Information of the ship shows on the LEFT hand now. 8. Solve a bug which makes some parts working incorrectly. Please keep your eyes on us, we will keep updating it very soon, with a Cute and Lovely AI assistant! ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ We will keep updating this game, so we REALLY need your suggestion to make it better, please try and tell us! STARWAY VR is a Casual VR game refer to Casual Mobile games. In this game, players mining for resources in unknown space and use those resources building new Space Ship parts, and then combine all the parts to a full function space ship. By using this new ship , players can pass through the STAR GATE to another space area. All those gates connected as STARWAY, through the STARWAY, players could finally find out the way to back to home earth.  Space Ships - Building Space Ship like LEGO In STARWAY VR, players build spaceships by combining several parts of ship together to be a completed Space Ship.  Game Flow 1. Collect resources 2. Buy parts of ship 3. Combine them to a better spaceship 4. Collect resource to open STAR GATE 5. Pass through the STAR GATE to next space area or galaxy A Fun and relax VR game
